summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4285 for the improvement of Corliss Avenue, from East Green Lake Way to North 85th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 50923, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
